00026         class REFLECTION_API construct_attribute : public attribute
00027         {
00028         public:
00029 
00030                 typedef void(*TDtor)(void*);
00031 
00032                 template<class Deleg>
00033                 static construct_attribute create(function_type* ctorType, const Deleg& ctorDeleg, TDtor d)
00034                 {
00035                         static_assert(sizeof(Deleg) <= member::_deleg_buf_size, "Delegate buffer too small");
00036                         return construct_attribute(ctorType, (void*)&ctorDeleg, d);
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 construct_attribute(function_type* ctorType, void* ctorDeleg, TDtor d);
00040 
00041                 virtual construct_attribute* clone() const;
00042 
00043                 virtual void release();
00044 
00046                 void* create_instance(void** args) const;
00047                 
00049                 void destroy_instance(void* v) const;
00050 
00052                 const function_type& ctor_type() const;
00053 
00054         private:
00055                 struct construct_impl;
00056                 construct_impl* m_impl;
00057 
00058                 construct_attribute(construct_impl* impl);
00059         };
